metadata.name: Remote Access Tool - AnyDesk Silent Installation
metadata.comment: Detects AnyDesk Remote Desktop silent installation. Which can be used by attackers to gain remote access.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--install')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--start-with-win')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--silent')))

output.summary: Detects AnyDesk Remote Desktop silent installation. Which can be used by attackers to gain remote access.

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line, CurrentDirectory False positive: Legitimate deployment of AnyDesk References: https://twitter.com/TheDFIRReport/status/1423361119926816776?s=20, https://support.anydesk.com/Automatic_Deployment
